item.title: 5 Years of being a Microsoft MVP!
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: Wow! It’s been 5 years since my first Microsoft MVP award. If you don’t know what the Microsoft MVP program is, check this site. Throughout the years, I have transitioned from various categories and technology award. In particular, Windows Development (Windows 8/8.1/10/RT and XAML), to Developer Technologies (C#, .NET, Xamarin), to Azure with focus on Blockchain, PAAS (Platform as a Service), and Integrations. In those years, I’ve seen Microsoft and the MVP program changed a lot (for the better).
